doc.title: Machine 11/Automaten Elf
doc.plot: Eleven lives and works within a coffee vending machine. How and why he got there is unknown. His only friend Savant brings him essentials to allow him to survive inside it's cramped and lonely interior. Every morning he awakens from a reoccuring dream that tells him that a mysterious girl will help him escape from his coffee vending prison. In one final attempt at freedom, Eleven plans to risk everything in order to get his life back.
